name: io.github.apeyroux/mcp-xmind
description: A Model Context Protocol server for analyzing and querying XMind mind maps. This tool provides powerful capabilities for searching, extracting, and analyzing content from XMind files.

tools.name: read_xmind
tools.description:
Parse and analyze XMind files
Extract complete mind map structure

tools.name: get_todo_tasks
tools.description:
Extract and analyze TODO tasks
Include task context and hierarchy

tools.name: list_xmind_directory
tools.description:
Recursively scan for XMind files
Filter and organize results

tools.name: read_multiple_xmind_files
tools.description:
Process multiple files simultaneously
Compare and analyze across files

tools.name: search_xmind_files
tools.description:
Search files by name patterns
Recursive directory scanning

tools.name: extract_node
tools.description:
Smart fuzzy path matching
Ranked search results
Complete subtree extraction

tools.name: extract_node_by_id

Direct node access by ID
Fast and precise retrieval

tools.name: search_nodes
tools.description:
Multi-criteria content search
Configurable search fields
